dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9123 IH: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a new ZIP Code for certain communities in Wisconsin.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Steil introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform

form.official-title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a new ZIP Code for certain communities in Wisconsin.

section.text: Not later than 270 days after the enactment of this Act, the United States Postal Service shall designate a single, unique ZIP Code for, as nearly as practicable, each of the following communities:
